item.title: Testing Out AI Workflows
item.author: mathewrupp@gmail.com (Mathew Rupp)
item.description: Lately I’ve been playing around with AI workflows using Cursor and various web chatbots. I’ll post a more in depth workflow later, I’m mostly writing this to see if my blog post workflow is still working….
